about_the_game:
Welcome to vTERM, the ultimate ATC radar simulator that puts you in the hot seat of air traffic control! Step into the shoes of a seasoned air traffic controller and experience the thrill of managing the skies above a fictional airport.

Immerse yourself in the highly realistic user-interface, crafted to mimic the STARS scope used by real-life air traffic controllers. With vTERM, you'll navigate through the complexities of managing inbound and outbound flights, and ensuring the safety and efficiency of air traffic flow.

Whether you're a seasoned air traffic controller or an aspiring enthusiast, vTERM offers a challenging and immersive experience that will push your skills to the limit. Are you ready to take control of the skies and become the master of air traffic management?
